system.description: When a faction searches the city for useful information—rare occult knowledge, another faction's weaknesses, the location of an artifact—roll with their Size.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, a member of the inquiring faction ends up dead or missing...but not before passing off some vital info resulting from the search to one of the PCs.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, they uncover some crucial details, enough to ask a PC or notable NPC to pursue things further. On a 7-9, they also pick 2:

  • they attract the attention of a rival faction
  • they have to make an asset they control vulnerable
  • they take -1 ongoing until the end of the next faction turn

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, they uncover some crucial details, enough to ask a PC or notable NPC to pursue things further. On a 10+, they also pick 1:

  • they attract the attention of a rival faction
  • they have to make an asset they control vulnerable
  • they take -1 ongoing until the end of the next faction turn
